words.defineEn: an animal, typically an insect or a bird, that transfers pollen from one flower to another
words.defineVi: một loài động vật, điển hình là côn trùng hoặc chim, chuyển phấn hoa từ hoa này sang hoa khác

examples: Excessive use of pesticides can breed resistance in pests, making them harder to control in the future.
But inside our homes, termites are pests.
The Asian longhorned tick is truly a villainous pest.
Old piping, stuff like that, will always cause pest problems, a bunch of places for the rodents and pests to hide.
From Texas to South America, leafcutter ants are huge agricultural pests.
words.defineEn: an insect or small animal that destroys or damages crops, food, etc.
words.defineVi: một loại côn trùng hoặc động vật nhỏ phá hoại hoặc làm hỏng mùa màng, thực phẩm, v.v.

examples: Now, unlike arthropods, mollusks have hearts with multiple chambers.
And this same reasoning applies to mollusks.
This animal is sometimes interpreted as a mollusk.
Narrator: The size of the pearl largely depends on the size of the mollusk.
The main reason for the color difference is the species of the mollusk.
words.defineEn: any invertebrate that lives in aquatic or damp habitats and has a soft unsegmented body, often covered with a shell
words.defineVi: bất kỳ động vật không xương sống nào sống trong môi trường sống dưới nước hoặc ẩm ướt và có thân mềm không phân đốt, thường được bao phủ bởi một lớp vỏ

examples: So gastropods are pretty incredible!
Gastropods tend to have a lot of similarities, like a muscular foot, eyes on stalks, and slime.
There’s also a whole group of gastropods known for their bright colors.
Snails and slugs are all part of a big group of animals called gastropods.
Other algae and small immobile animals can attach to it, and it can provide shelter and food for other critters, like gastropods, crustaceans, and other small invertebrates.
words.defineEn: a type of mollusk with a single, usually spirally coiled shell, a muscular foot, and a head with sensory tentacles and a mouth
words.defineVi: một loại động vật thân mềm có vỏ đơn, thường cuộn xoắn ốc, chân vạm vỡ và đầu có xúc tu cảm giác và miệng

examples: Freshwater fish have the opposite problem.
Freshwater fish have an easier time keeping the right amount of water inside of their bodies.
Because freshwater fish don’t drink!
The Bolson pupfish is a small freshwater fish found in northern Mexico.
And in freshwater fish, gills also end up taking in some of the water, and the fish ends up with more water in its body.
words.defineEn: a fish that can not survive in salty waters and usually lives in lakes or rivers
words.defineVi: một loài cá không thể tồn tại ở vùng nước mặn và thường sống ở hồ hoặc sông

examples: Since water is always moving over a fish’s gills, that means water is always leaving a saltwater fish’s body.
Other fish, called saltwater fish, live in water that has lots of salt in it, like the ocean.
As water flows over a saltwater fish’s gills, the salt that’s in the water outside of the fish’s body sucks out some of the water that’s inside of the fish’s body through its gills.
Experts think that this is probably one of the factors that killed an estimated 9.4 million saltwater fish in 1992 during Hurricane Andrew.
words.defineEn: a fish that can survive in salty water and lives in oceans, also known as marine fish
words.defineVi: một loài cá có thể tồn tại trong nước mặn và sống ở đại dương, còn được gọi là cá biển

examples: Little is known about this deep sea fish.

Scientists hypothesize that the parazen may be investing more energy in their young than other deep sea fish because of where they live: open, sandy areas that have very few spots to hide from predators.
That is, until researchers happened to discover that a deep sea fish, the parazen, is most likely a mouthbrooder.
words.defineEn: a fish that can survive the salty water of the sea
words.defineVi: một loài cá có thể sống sót trong nước mặn của biển

examples: Canadian wildlife includes animals like bears, moose, beavers, and eagles.
The wildlife in our backyard enjoys the salmonberries as much as we do.
The plant is protected under the Wildlife and Countryside Act.
A variety of plants and wildlife thrive on the lush riverbank.
Africa is known for its diverse wildlife, including elephants, lions, and giraffes.
words.defineEn: all wild animals, considered as a whole, living in the natural environment
words.defineVi: tất cả các loài động vật hoang dã, được coi là một tổng thể, sống trong môi trường tự nhiên
